author: craigmcc
msg: Do not bother trying to look up the alternate system ID for a null public ID.
(It was my understanding that a HashMap worked fine with a null key and/or a
null value, but just in case ...)
Submitted by: Colin Sampaleanu <colin@Bspark.com>

author: craigmcc
msg: Update the JavaDoc comments for the controller servlet to document the
configuration parameters for multipart file upload handling.
Change the default "config" value from "/WEB-INF/action.xml" to
"/WEB-INF/struts-config.xml", and the default "validate" value from "false"
to "true".  These changes have the effect of defaulting to the 1.0 config file
format, instead of the 0.5 version, which is more appropriate for a 1.0
release.

author: craigmcc
msg: Add "event and listener infrastructure for Struts" to the 1.1 TODO list.
This is going to be dramatically affected by other changes contemplated in
1.1, and it looks like we'll be able to add it without a tremendous amount
of backwards compatibility pain anyway -- so I'd rather not hold up 1.0
while we figure out exactly what events are "interesting" and all the
other issues related to including this now.
Add a BeanUtils method to clone a JavaBean that follows the normal
conventions, even if the class itself does not implement Cloneable so that
the clone() method works.  This is based on a patch submitted by Taylor
Cowan <taylor@bondisoftware.com>, but takes advantage of the
PropertyUtils.copyProperties() method that was not available when the
patch was submitted.

author: craigmcc
msg: Besides using a Map for dynamic request parameters, also allow the
generation of a single request parameter by looking up a bean property.
Submitted by:	James Strachan <james@metastuff.com>

author: craigmcc
msg: Small docco update, and keep the initialization of Digester rules in
alphabetical order (not because the Digester cares, but to make it easier
to see rules that are related to each other).
